Articles.Content:
I invent a traveling time machine and just skip the next couple centuries to where the cookie is. I take said cookie and take it to the restaurant at the end of the universe.

My cookie.

I crash my spacecraft into your spacecraft, steal the cookie from you, and run away. 

My cookie that is still stuck at Jupiter and I really should have thought this through before stealing the cookie and now I'm stuck here and I can't even eat my cookie and now someone is probably going to steal it. But still my cookie.  

Edit: DANG IT! I GOT NINJA'D! 

Edited April 16, 2017 by max_creative
:(
i fly next to your spacecraft, lure you in with struts, and trade you struts and boosters for the cookie. now the cookie is mine muhahaha

The Kraken Strikes!

Space's cookie.

I kraken the kraken. Kraken^2 gives cookie to me

My cookie

The Kraken can only be tamed by Danny2462! So he takes it and protects it with universe destroying traps.

His cookie.

Edited April 16, 2017 by Spacetraindriver

But what if I am danny? Therefore, my cookie.

My cookie through impersonation

I write my name on the cookie with icing and claim it.

my cookie through personalization.
Owner person is not recognized. Unauthorized cookie.

I authorize the cookie to myself.

My authorized cookie

you filed the authorization papers incorrectly, ergo, due to the beurocratic process, the cookie reverts to its previous owner, everybody who took the cookie after me stole it, so I still own the cookie, therefore the cookie reverts to me

my cookie

Not bothering with bureaucracy, I run up to you and punch you, taking the cookie for myself.

My cookie.

Not bothering with subtlety either, I see. I run up to you and arrest you for assault, and confiscate your cookie as evidence.

Exhibit B, AKA the stolen cookie.

The court recognizes the evidence as obtained illegally (you have forgotten to read write his rights).
The cookie will be utilized.

Edited April 17, 2017 by kerbiloid

then this happen let's use some chemical to do a complete neural neutralization, and let's hope that's not gonna leave some trace or damage ... while at some point it may help also ... there a lot of rng and "life happen in between" in all that

my full neural neutraliztion medicalised cookies ohohohoho, also i don't still cookies i may eat some sometime

 

Edited April 17, 2017 by WinkAllKerb''

Your testimony as given above is inadmissible in this court, the cookie is transferred to me during the recess.

My cookie.

Forces of evil destroyed the cookie.

Edited April 17, 2017 by kerbiloid

I create new cookie in secret lab.

My lab and cookie.

I reveal that I am the true maker of the cookie and all of you bow before my might ( ) and @qzgy gives the cookie to me, my cookie.

 

P.S You May Not create a new cookie!!!!

I hire a team of assassins to kill the true maker and waltz over to take his cookie.

My Cookie!!

You and everyone of your 'friends' are taken to jail for man slaughter.

Jail Gaurd's cookie.
The only assassin woman from his team has caught the cookie and escaped.

She is spotted by the police and starts to be chased. In the process she drops the cookie, and one of the police officers claims it as evidence.

Exhibit A: stolen cookie.

I raid the evidence locker, and obtain Exhibit A

My cookie

I take the cookie.

my cookie.
